name: .FWACTIONB File Extension
summary: Learn about .FWACTIONB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Action bundle created and used by Freeway Pro, an app that allows users to create websites without having to write any code; contains one or more actions that can be added to a .FREEWAY document in order to add functionality to the website that can't be created through Freeway Pro's interface.

content: Action bundles are useful when your desired functionality requires more than one action. For example, the "ScriptyFader" suite requires four separate actions. By using the FWACTIONB file you can install the multiple actions as one action.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
